phrs.translation: [物理]停留时间；[化]逗留时间（等于residence）
n. 依法登记的住址；法定住所

sentences.sentence: Lower-income residences, along with manufacturing facilities, would be confined, therefore, to the western margins of the CBD.
sentences.translation: 因此，低收入住宅和制造业设施将被限制在中心商务区的西部边缘。

sentences.sentence: Sharing and cooperation were almost certainly part of early Puebloan life, even for people living in largely independent single-household residences scattered across the landscape.
sentences.translation: 即使是对那些居住在高独立性、分散在这个地区的独户住宅中的人们来说，分享和合作是早期普韦布洛人生活中几乎必需的一部分。

sentences.sentence: Researchers also observed problems resulting from pairing interracial students in residences.
sentences.translation: 研究人员还观察了让跨种族学生配成对住在宿舍所产生的问题。
